## Overview

SEERdb is a package for accessing data from the SEER medicare dataset.


## File types

* hsp
  + demo
  + occurence
  + revenue
  + span
  + value
* msbf
  + ab.summary
  + abcd.summary
  + cc.summary
  + oth.cc.summary
* medpar
* nch
  + base
  + line
  + demo
* outpat 
  + base
  + condition
  + occurence
  + revenue
  + span
  + value
* SEER
  + colon
  + lung
* census
  + tract.encr
  + zipcode.unencr
